org.apache.ignite.hadoop.util

Class BasicUserNameMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.hadoop.util.BasicUserNameMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, UserNameMapper

    public class BasicUserNameMapper
extends Object
implements UserNameMapper
    Name mapper which maps one user name to another based on predefined dictionary. If name is not found in the dictionary, or dictionary is not defined, either passed user name or some default value could be returned.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getDefaultUserName

        @Nullable
public String getDefaultUserName()
        Get default user name (optional).

        This user name will be used if provided mappings doesn't contain mapping for the given user name and {#isUseDefaultUserName} is set to true.

        Defaults to null.

        Returns:
        Default user name.

      • setDefaultUserName

        Parameters:
